mapper.select: select product_name from (select product_name from product where product_name like #{search} order by product_name asc) where rownum <=5
select * from maincategory
select * from maincategory join subcategory using(main_category_no)
select * from product order by 1
select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from product order by 1 ) a where rownum <= #{page} * 10 ) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 10
select * from product where product_no=#{productNo}
mapper.insert: insert into product (product_no, product_name, price, product_count, sub_category_no,theme_no, company_no) values(products_seq.nextval, #{productName}, #{price}, #{productCount},#{subCategoryNo}, #{themeNo}, #{companyNo})
mapper.select: select b.board_no, b.board_thumbnail, b.board_title, p.price as "price" from board b join product p on b.product_no = p.product_no order by 1

select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from( select * from board join product using(product_no)) join subcategory using(sub_category_no) order by board_no) a where rownum <= #{page} * 12 ) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 12

select * from( select rownum rn, a.* from( select * from (board join product using(product_no)) join subcategory using(sub_category_no) where sub_category_no=#{subCategoryNo} order by board_no) a where rownum <= #{page}*20) b where b.rn > (#{page}-1)*20

select * from( select rownum rn, a.* from( select * from order_detail r join orders o on (r.order_no = o.order_no) join delivery d on (d.order_no=r.order_no) join product p on (p.product_no=r.product_no) join board b on p.product_no=b.board_no join subcategory s on(s.sub_category_no=p.sub_category_no) where delivery_state='s' ORDER BY order_count desc) a where rownum <= #{page}*12) b where b.rn > (#{page}-1)*12

select * from( select rownum rn, a.* from( select * from board b join product p on p.product_no=b.product_no join subcategory s on p.sub_category_no=s.sub_category_no order by price asc) a where rownum <= #{page}*12) b where b.rn > (#{page}-1)*12

select * from( select rownum rn, a.* from( select * from board b join product p on p.product_no=b.product_no join subcategory s on p.sub_category_no=s.sub_category_no order by price asc) a where rownum <= #{page}*12) b where b.rn > (#{page}-1)*12

select * from( select rownum rn, a.* from( SELECT b.*, p.price FROM board b JOIN product p on (p.product_no=b.product_no) JOIN subcategory s on(p.sub_category_no=s.sub_category_no) WHERE p.price >= #{minPrice} AND p.price <= #{maxPrice} ORDER BY b.board_no) a where rownum <= #{page}*12) b where b.rn > (#{page}-1)*12
select*from(select * from( select * from board join product using(product_no)) join subcategory using(sub_category_no) where board_no=#{boardNo})join company using(company_no)
select * from product where product_name=#{productName}
select count(*) from product
mapper.insert: insert into board(board_no, board_title, board_thumbnail, board_content, board_attach, member_no, product_no) values(board_seq.nextval, #{boardTitle}, #{boardThumbnail}, #{boardContent},#{boardAttach}, #{memberNo}, #{productNo})
mapper.select: select * from orders where member_no=#{memberNo} and complete='r'
mapper.insert:
select ORDER_NO.nextval from dual
insert into orders(order_no, order_date, member_no) values(#{orderNo}, sysdate, #{memberNo})
insert into order_detail(order_detail_no, order_count, order_no, product_no) values(orderdetail.nextval, #{orderCount}, #{orderNo}, #{productNo})
mapper.update: update orders set complete='c' where order_no=#{orderNo}
mapper.select: select * from review join member using (member_no) where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_no, review_content, score, review_attach, member_no, board_no,review_date) values(review_seq.nextval,#{reviewContent},#{score},#{reviewAttach},#{memberNo},#{boardNo},sysdate)
mapper.select: select m.member_no, m.id,m.name, o.order_no, o.order_date, p.product_name, b.* from member m join orders o on(m.member_no=o.member_no) join order_detail d on o.order_no = d.order_no join product p on p.product_no = d.product_no join board b on b.product_no = p.product_no where m.id=#{id}

select m.member_no, m.id, m.name, q.qna_no, q.qna_category, q.qna_title, q.qna_content, q.qna_date, q.qna_hide, q.qna_answer, q.board_no, p.product_no, p.product_name from member m join qna q on(m.member_no=q.member_no) join board b on q.board_no = b.board_no join product p on b.product_no = p.product_no where q.board_no = #{boardNo}
select * from qna where qna_no=#{qnaNo}

select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from board b join product p on(b.product_no = p.product_no) join subcategory s on(p.sub_category_no=s.sub_category_no) join theme t on(t.theme_no=p.theme_no) where t.theme_no=#{theme_no}) a where rownum <= #{page} * 10 ) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 10 order by price

select * from( select * from( select * from( select * from member join company using(company_no)) join product using(company_no)) join subcategory using(sub_category_no)) join maincategory using(main_category_no) where id = #{id}

SELECT gender, SUM(order_count) AS order_count FROM ( SELECT 'm' AS gender, SUM(s.order_count) AS order_count FROM orders o JOIN order_detail s ON o.order_no=s.order_no JOIN member m ON m.member_no=o.member_no WHERE s.product_no=#{productNo} AND m.gender='m'
UNION
SELECT 'f' AS gender, NVL(SUM(s.order_count), 0) AS order_count FROM orders o JOIN order_detail s ON o.order_no=s.order_no JOIN member m ON m.member_no=o.member_no WHERE s.product_no=#{productNo} AND m.gender='f' ) GROUP BY gender
